content: the effortless earwarmer is a super quick and easy stash buster skill level beginner method knit in the round from the bottom up supplies stitch marker us 13 / 9mm 16 circular knitting needles super bulky yarn weight 6 malabrigo rasta but any weight 6 yarn is fine if you meet gauge approximately 35 yards size and fit adult/teen 8 5 wide x 4 25 tall 20-22 circumference if you have any questions please contact me through ravelry or email me at littlelarkspur@gmail com thank you anna ©2022 little larkspur designs ● effortless earwarmer ●all rights reserved
